```{r read-data}
library(readxl)
data <- read_excel("Data/WaterShed Combined Data.xlsx")
```

```{r ggplot}
library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(data,aes(x = "Temp" , y = "pH" , color = "Site")) + geom_point()

p
```
